---
title: "HCUP Resource at the UHC"
---

The Healthcare Cost and Utilization Project (HCUP) includes the largest collection of longitudinal hospital care data in the United States.

## Databases

HCUP has both nationwide HCUP and state-specific HCUP databases.

-   **Nationwide**
    -   [**NIS** - National Inpatient Sample](https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/db/nation/nis/nisdbdocumentation.jsp)
    -   [**KID** - Kids' Inpatient Database](https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/db/nation/kid/kiddbdocumentation.jsp)
    -   [**NASS** Nationwide Ambulatory Surgery Sample](https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/db/nation/nass/nassdbdocumentation.jsp)
    -   [**NEDS** - Nationwide Emergency Department Sample](https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/db/nation/neds/nedsdbdocumentation.jsp)
    -   [**NRD** - Nationwide Readmissions Database](https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/db/nation/nrd/nrddbdocumentation.jsp)
-   **State-specific**
    -   [**SID** - State Inpatient Databases](https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/db/state/siddbdocumentation.jsp)
    -   [**SASD** - State Ambulatory Surgery and Services Databases](https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/db/state/sasddbdocumentation.jsp)
    -   [**SEDD** - State Emergency Department Databases](https://www.hcup-us.ahrq.gov/db/state/sedddbdocumentation.jsp)

## What is HCUP

> The Healthcare Cost and Utilization Project (HCUP) includes the largest collection of longitudinal hospital care data in the United States.
